title: Day 2: Your First Question
description: Psalm 2:1–2, Genesis 3:1, Matthew 2:1–2.  A senior and experienced lawyer was helping me prepare  He showed me the significance of a first question
itunes:title: Day 2: Your First Question
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 2:1–2, Genesis 3:1, Matthew 2:1–2.  A senior and experienced lawyer was helping me prepare  He showed me the significance of a first question
itunes:summary: ‘What is your first question going to be?’ I was preparing my cross-examination for one of the first criminal trials in which I was involved when I worked as a barrister. A senior and experienced lawyer was helping me prepare. He showed me the significance of a first question.
itunes:author: Nicky and Pippa Gumbel
